metadata.title: CVE-2017-9928 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
In lrzip 0.631, a stack buffer overflow was found in the function get_fileinfo in lrzip.c:979, which allows attackers to cause a denial of service via a crafted file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2017-9928` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

lrzip - 0.631+git180528-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: lrzip package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.631+git180528-1').
